mapper.sql: id, member_card, last_integral, last_red_bag, last_coupon, total_money, frozen_amount, frozen_ticket, frozen_integral, frozen_red_bag
mapper.select: SELECT member_card memberCard, frozen_amount frozenAmount, total_money totalMoney FROM member_amount WHERE member_card=#{memberCard} limit 1

SELECT member_card memberCard, frozen_amount frozenAmount, total_money totalMoney FROM member_amount where member_card in
#{item}

mapper.update:
update member_amount
last_integral = #{lastIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_red_bag = #{lastRedBag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_coupon = #{lastCoupon,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frozen_amount = #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frozen_ticket = #{frozenTicket,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frozen_integral = #{frozenIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frozen_red_bag = #{frozenRedBag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where member_card = #{memberCard}

update member_amount set member_card = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_integral = #{lastIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_red_bag = #{lastRedBag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_coupon = #{lastCoupon,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_amount = #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_ticket = #{frozenTicket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_integral = #{frozenIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_red_bag = #{frozenRedBag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
